channel.title: [REQ]Beta Testers, PyroWars[REQ]
channel.description:
Okay as you can tell from the title, im requsting [b]Beta testers[/b] for my private server "PyroWars (508).
What the beta testers do:
[ul][*]Download the PyroWars (508) client [*]Be online when i need them [*]Alert me on glitches [*]Send a detailed report at the end of day [*]Have fun[/ul]
What the beta testers receive from me as a Thank You :D, is becoming a [b]Moderator[/b] on the server and have the right to keep control of the players *You must follow the Moderator rules though, you can find them on [url=http://"http://pyrowars.webs.com"]http://pyrowars.webs.com[/url]
To Apply to be a Beta Tester: send an email to "unlitpyro@hotmail.co.uk" and in the application you must write a paragraph of what else you will bring as a Beta tester, and also write the username: you are planning to use (appropriate names for a mod).
Lucky Beta Testers will receive an email from "unlitpyro@hotmail.co.uk" telling them what times they are expected to be online (people that fail to be online will be kicked out of the beta :banned:)
Beta Testers will experience these moments before anyone else: [img]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd239/ash4if3/BountyHunter.jpg[/img] [img]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd239/ash4if3/GodWars.jpg[/img] [img]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd239/ash4if3/KingBlackDragon.jpg[/img] [img]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd239/ash4if3/SkillCapes.jpg[/img] [img]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd239/ash4if3/TrainingArea.jpg[/img] [img]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd239/ash4if3/wildernesspking.jpg[/img]
Download link to client: [url=http://"http://www.4shared.com/file/87815894/79e9d249/PyroWars__508__clients.html"]http://www.4shared.com/file/87815894/79e9d...8__clients.html[/url]
So good luck and hope you can become the first ever beta testers... :D

item.title: [REQ]Beta Testers, PyroWars[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Unlit_Pyro Unlit Pyro
item.description:
@Unlit_Pyro wrote:

if it is i am really sorry i couldnt find the request part in the forum so i thought it might be here and i also did not know that it was against the rules to ask for beta testers, plus im not advertising the server, i just need beta testers to actualy test the server out and to see if it works

if a admin or mod move this to the right section of the forum it would be great
and sorry to the admins and mods if i actually did not follow the rules or put it on the right section of the forum (like i said before i couldnt find the request part in the forums).

Read full topic

Okay as you can tell from the title, im requsting Beta testers for my private server "PyroWars (508).

What the beta testers do:

[]Be online when i need them

What the beta testers receive from me as a Thank You :D, is becoming a Moderator on the server and have the right to keep control of the players
*You must follow the Moderator rules though, you can find them on http://pyrowars.webs.com

To Apply to be a Beta Tester: send an email to "unlitpyro@hotmail.co.uk" and in the application you must write a paragraph of what else you will bring as a Beta tester, and also write the username: you are planning to use (appropriate names for a mod).

Lucky Beta Testers will receive an email from "unlitpyro@hotmail.co.uk" telling them what times they are expected to be online (people that fail to be online will be kicked out of the beta :banned:)
